description: Create a cost code trucking cost summary.
permissions: Admins can create summaries. Managers who are members of the broker can create summaries for that broker.
side_effects: Creates a summary record and computes/stores results for the specified broker and date range.
validation_notes: broker, start-on, and end-on are required. start-on and end-on must be present dates; end-on must be on or after start-on.

flags.name: --start-on
flags.validation: Must be a date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

flags.name: --end-on
flags.validation: Must be a date in YYYY-MM-DD format and on/after start-on.
